data.message: I need help with my company's page. The previous person managing this account had left the company and no one else have access to the account. Please advise? I had read through all the helpful tips, which does not help. I only have the company's name. The email and password that is tied to the account is no longer reachable. Please HELP!

replies.message: Hi there. If the Pages is unmanaged, you'll see Unofficial Page below the cover photo. You can then request to claim the Pages and become the admin, or merge the Page into a Page you already manage for your business: http://bit.ly/2rwftgw. However, if the Page is managed, you won't see the option to claim it. If this is the case, you can report the Page: http://bit.ly/2rgz7Na. Please keep in mind that we are not able to provide support for Page disputes between third parties. -Jessica
